entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34 except minus 38 in the Postville area.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34 except minus 38 in the Postville area. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28 except minus 32 in the Postville area.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28 except minus 32 in the Postville area. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
